data.title: UPDATE: 2 PM 12/25-Winter Storm Warning for Lewis and Jefferson Counties-Lake Effect Snow Warning for N. Herkimer Co and Adirondacks
data.meta_description: The Home of The Moose & The Blizzard
data.text:
FOR LEWIS COUNTY.......WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST TUESDAY...

* WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet in the most persistent bands. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow, mainly today and tonight. * WHERE...Lewis county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions.

FOR N.HERKIMER CO AND ADIRONDACKS......LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST
